synopsis.text: Hennako-chan's eccentricity and telekinetic abilities create a whirlwind of chaos in this black comedy anime series for mature audiences. With just a single gaze, this elementary school girl can manipulate people, animals, plants, and objects, exposing everyone's secrets and causing mayhem. The series delves into the unpredictable daily lives of Hennako-chan and her family, which includes her quirky parents, a provocative elder sister, and a former stray dog. As Hennako-chan's supernatural powers wreak havoc, the lives of those around her are never dull or ordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
